Package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.utils.position

Class EntityPosition

java.lang.Object
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.utils.position.EntityPosition
@AvailableSince("5.3") public class EntityPosition extends Object
Represents a position for an entity in 3D space, including both coordinates and facing direction.
Since:
5.3

      direction - The facing direction (pitch and yaw).

  • Method Details

    • ofAbsolute

      @AvailableSince("5.3") public static EntityPosition ofAbsolute(double x, double y, double z, double pitch, double yaw)
      Creates an EntityPosition with absolute coordinates and direction.
      Parameters:
      x - The absolute X coordinate.
      y - The absolute Y coordinate.
      z - The absolute Z coordinate.
      pitch - The absolute pitch (vertical angle).
      yaw - The absolute yaw (horizontal angle).
      Returns:
      A new EntityPosition instance with the specified absolute coordinates and direction.
      Since:
      5.3

    • ofLocation

      @AvailableSince("5.3") public static EntityPosition ofLocation(org.bukkit.Location location)
      Creates an EntityPosition from a Bukkit Location with absolute coordinates and direction.
      Parameters:
      location - The Bukkit Location to convert.
      Returns:
      A new EntityPosition instance representing the given location.
      Since:
      5.3

    • fromString

      @AvailableSince("5.3") public static EntityPosition fromString(String positionStr) throws PositionParseException
      Parses an EntityPosition from a string representation. The expected format is "<x>,<y>,<z>:<pitch>:<yaw>" for absolute coordinates and direction, or "<x>,<y>,<z>" for absolute coordinates with default direction (0 pitch, 0 yaw).
      Relative coordinates and direction can be specified using the '~' prefix, e.g., "~10,~,~-10:0:90".
      Parameters:
      positionStr - The string representation of the position.
      Returns:
      A new EntityPosition instance parsed from the string.
      Throws:
      PositionParseException - If the string format is invalid.
      Since:
      5.3

    • getVector

      @AvailableSince("5.3") public VectorPosition getVector()
      Gets the vector position (coordinates).
      Returns:
      The vector position.
      Since:
      5.3

    • getDirection

      @AvailableSince("5.3") public FaceDirection getDirection()
      Gets the facing direction (pitch and yaw).
      Returns:
      The facing direction.
      Since:
      5.3

    • augmentBukkitLocation

      @AvailableSince("5.3") public void augmentBukkitLocation(org.bukkit.Location base)
      Augments a given Bukkit Location by applying the relative components of this EntityPosition. This modifies the provided Location in place.
      Parameters:
      base - The base Bukkit Location to augment and offset for relative positioning as required.
      Since:
      5.3

    • toBukkitLocation

      @AvailableSince("5.3") public org.bukkit.Location toBukkitLocation(org.bukkit.Location base)
      Converts this EntityPosition to a new Bukkit Location based on a given base Location. This does not modify the base Location, but returns a new Location instance.
      Parameters:
      base - The base Bukkit Location to use as a reference for relative positioning as required.
      Returns:
      A new Bukkit Location representing this EntityPosition.
      Since:
      5.3
